column4: I have a problem with my dvd player. I insert the dvd but nothing happens. I know it works because i booted under windows and it does.I tested both  movie and a data dvd. Its IDE dvd. At /etc/mtab I can't see it, and at /var/log/syslog nothing shows. I have a problem with my dvd player. I insert the dvd but nothing happens.
